edu.kit.scc.dem.wapsrv.repository

Interface TransactionRepository

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AnnotationRepository, BackupRepository, ContainerRepository, WapObjectRepository
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CollectedRepository, JenaRepository

    public interface TransactionRepository
    Interface to interact with the repository
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Matthias Dressel, Michael Hitzker, Markus Hoefler, Andreas Loeffler, Timo Schmidt

    • Method Detail

      • getTransactionDataset

        org.apache.commons.rdf.api.Dataset getTransactionDataset()
        Gets the transaction dataset.
        Returns:
        The transaction dataset

      • readRdfTransaction

        default void readRdfTransaction(RdfTransactionExecuter transaction)
        Perform a read only transaction on the Dataset of the database. The transaction function is a lambda expression: (Dataset) -> {function;}
        Parameters:
        transaction - the transaction function

      • writeRdfTransaction

        default void writeRdfTransaction(RdfTransactionExecuter transaction)
        Perform a read/write transaction on the Dataset of the database. The transaction function is a lambda expression: (Dataset) -> {function;}
        Parameters:
        transaction - the transaction function

      • doRdfTransaction

        default void doRdfTransaction(TransactionRepository.Type type,
                              RdfTransactionExecuter transaction)
        Do RDF transaction.
        Parameters:
        type - The type
        transaction - The transaction

      • beginTransaction

        default boolean beginTransaction(TransactionRepository.Type type)
        Begin transaction.
        Parameters:
        type - The type
        Returns:
        True, if successful

      • abortTransaction

        default void abortTransaction()
        Abort transaction.

      • endTransaction

        default void endTransaction(boolean wasOpend)
        End transaction.
        Parameters:
        wasOpend - True, if opened
